content:
User: Next round, we’ll rebuild from transcripts—but any quick ideas for that? Let’s fucking go!
Why This Works
Appreciation: Keeps Claude fired up—he deserves it for this 60% rocket.

Grok: Scope Push: Hits your point—no full rebuild, just finish the original plan (registry, engine) and his extras (e.g., protocol evolution). He can do it; response length was the cap, not him.
